Accepted Papers

  • Patricia Johann and Edward Morehouse. Deep Induction for Inductive Families
  • Juan Montoya. Asymptotic Reasoning with Two Variables
  • Eric Raidl. Logics of Importation and Exportation for the Implicative Conditional
  • Han Gao, Daniil Kozhemiachenko and Nicola Olivetti. Paraconsistent Constructive Modal Logic
  • Richard Zuber. Denotation of sentential complements
  • Vera Koponen and Edward Karlsson. Convergence laws for expansions of linear preorders
  • Umberto Rivieccio and Miguel Muñoz Pérez. Indicative conditionals: algebraic considerations
  • Elena Romanenko, Oliver Kutz, Diego Calvanese and Giancarlo Guizzardi. Abstracting Conceptual Models as a Weakening Process
  • Timo Niek Franssen and Søren Brinck Knudstorp. Axiomatization and Decidability of Tense Information Logic
  • Colin Riba and Alexandre Kejikian. Infinitary Refinement Types for Temporal Properties in Scott Domains
  • Vicent Navarro Arroyo and Joost Johannes Joosten. On tame semantics for interpretability logic
  • Han Gao and Nicola Olivetti. Constructive Modal Logics: Bi-nested Calculi and Bi-relational Countermodels
  • Can Baskent, Dave Gilbert and Giorgio Venturi. Insensitive Games: Game Semantics for Modal Insensitivity
  • Bjørn Kjos-Hanssen and Paul Kim Long V. Nguyen. Index set complexity for congruence lattices of lattices
  • Nicolas Peltier. The Satisfiability Problem in a Separation Logic of Relations
  • Raul Fervari, Daniel Figueiredo and Manuel A. Martins. Graded Relation Updates in Modal Logic
  • José Espírito Santo and Ana Catarina Sousa. Proof Search in Classical Propositional Logic with Partial Proof Terms
  • Avgerinos Delkos and Marianna Girlando. A significance-based account of ceteris paribus counterfactuals
  • Paweł Rzążewski and Michał Stronkowski. Tabular intermediate logics comparison
  • Klaus-Dieter Schewe. Insignificant Choice Polynomial Time -- A Logic Capturing PTIME
  • Eric Raidl and Gilberto Gomes. Counterexamples to Import-Export in Conditionals: A Logical Analysis
